Dead by Daylight ist für Erwachsene Spieler, die Fans des Horror-Genres sind ein guter Multiplayer-Titel. Durch die kurzen und schnelllebigen Partien ist das Spielerlebnis immer neu und abwechslungsreich. Auch die wechselnden Mitspieler bringen immer wieder neuen und frischen Schwung in die Runden. So ist keine Partie gleich und fühlt sich immer neu an. Die Möglichkeit, gemeinsam mit Freunden zu spielen, erhöht ebenfalls den Spielspaß. Typisch für das Horror-Genre ist der Titel sehr blutig und beinhaltet viele angsterzeugende Inhalte. Das Spielgeschehen ist sehr stressig und voller Nervenkitzel. Das Eintauchen in die Rolle des Killers bietet zudem eine ganz besonders brutale Spielrolle.

Fun for Degenerates -

Playing survivor is great with people, extremely boring solo, I personally just play killer mostly. I would like to recommend but the community is also pretty toxic so.. if u can't beat them your forced to join them by slugging/face camping but lucky for you In time you'll get used to the post-chat bullying and find it to be "very poggers". 7/10
Fun game, every gameplay altering perk can be unlocked if you play enough, just don't read the chatbox before/after a match.

TLDR; Don't get into this game, there's nothing left worth getting into.

The game just ain't fun anymore, now instead of being able to hop on and goof about and have a fun good match (whether survivor or killer) it's turned into some of the sweatiest matches I've ever taken part in and I've played CS and there is some legit sweat there. The lore about the game is cool as far as lore goes but the main meat and potatoes of the game just feels uncertain of it self, like BHVR doesn't seem to know if they want the game to be competitive or for fun and as such they never really have a direct plan for the game and where it's gonna go, heck if you want a example go and watch when they explain how their MMR system works that they spent over a year on, I'll give you a spoiler tho it only accounts for 2 things, whether the survivor lived and escaped or died. They spent over a whole fricking year and that's the only thing they could come up with, at this point the old point system would be better than this. Not to mention the laughable anticheat that doesn't even record any time of demo for reporting purposes so if you don't record it devs won't do shit about it the only thing they save is the end game chat, which is like trying to fully understand a 300 page novel by just reading the back of the book.

At the end of the day you want to love this game and love playing it alone or with friends but you just can't, you end the play session with general frustration and lack of hope of it getting better and I ain't the only one who thinks like this, if you want a good idea of how the community has perceived the latest updates just go look at the steamcharts for DBD and look at the player count since August (when they first put out the final verison of the MMR for testing, full release was in beginning of Sept).
Just get rid of the hackers, and even if some killers are just anti game, at least it will be better.

Игра хуйня, у маньяков преимущества. Хуйня, шлак, залупа, елда, понос, пидорская компания, ебал рот создателей, помойка, поебота, создана шайкой уёбков.

Не стоит своих денег.

Дополняю: Бомжхейвер компания говоноедов, ебал их рот, добавили в EG эту парашу и стало детдомовцев больше.

Дополняю2: Фиксить персонажа Охотница не собираются - когда кидает топор, то он летит в кривой хитбокс (может попасть по воздуху, а засчитает по сюрву). Русофобы.

Дополняю3: Хуйня обнова 6.0.1, Маньяки стали богами, орех теперь параша, хотят чтобы игра сдохла, челы даже когда маньякам сделали легче - кемпят (ну совсем ахуели), предлагаю чтобы бомжхейВОР сделали РЕФАУНД всем и дали по 1 яхте каждому игроку в Реал Лайф. Шайка пиздализов совсем ахуела, в будущем ждите ещё больше не подкупных и конструктивных обзоров.

Дополняю4: Не играбельно, игра говно.
